creator: zodiac@holoweb.net
text:
If I include line breaks in my tasks' 'description' attribute, they get stripped 
bu ant -projecthelp (see attached testcase).

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
This behaviour is as required by the XML specification
http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#AVNormalize

You can't have multiline descriptions.

Actually I spoke too soon. As the spec states, if you use a character reference,
the character appears in the attribute value. So this

<project name='test' default='test'>
        <target name='test' description='
                this is a test of a multi-line 

                description with lots of leading
                whitespace, some of it
                        inconsistent'/>
</project>

contains a (single) newline character in the output of -projecthelp
creator: conor@apache.org
